name: Shield Slam
description: Bash the target with shield, dealing modest damage and stunning for 2 seconds. If the target was casting, interrupts the spell.
usage_notes: Bread-and-butter opener to disrupt dangerous foes.

name: Defensive Stance
description: Brace for impact, reducing all damage taken by 30% for 6 seconds. Movement is slowed slightly during this stance.
usage_notes: Reactive survival tool – time it to survive big enemy hits or focus fire.

name: Shield Wall
description: Raise a barrier that absorbs damage for all allies in a small radius behind you. For 4 seconds, the Bulwark and any allies immediately behind the shield have 50% of incoming damage absorbed by the Bulwark's health.
usage_notes: Critical defensive moment for the entire team. Can be countered by flanking or crowd-controlling the Bulwark.

name: Taunting Shout
description: Bellow a challenge, forcing nearby PvE enemies to switch aggro for 5 seconds. In PvP, marks up to 3 enemy players with "Challenged" debuff – if they attack anyone else, their damage is reduced by 20%.
usage_notes: Tactical tool to protect healers or squishy allies.

name: Charging Assault
description: Rush forward 15 meters with shield first. If you collide with an enemy, knock them back and briefly daze them (1s stun). Any allies in your path get a small speed boost.
usage_notes: Engage fights or peel enemies off allies. Requires careful aim.

name: Aegis of the Covenant
description: Call upon the Iron Covenant's power to become a living bulwark for 8 seconds. Damage taken is halved, every hit blocked heals nearby allies, and gain crowd-control immunity for first 3 seconds.
usage_notes: Anchor critical moments – standing ground on a flag while allies rally, or surviving a boss's enraged phase.
